text: Allah ney kaaba ko jo kay adab ka makan hai logon kay qaeem rehney ka sabab qarar dey diya aur izzat walay maheeney ko bhi aur haram mein qurbani honey walay janwar ko bhi aur unn janwaron ko bhi jin kay galay mein pattay hon yeh iss liye takay tum iss baat ka yaqeen ker lo kay be-shak Allah tamam aasmanon aur zamin kay andar ki cheezon ka ilm rakhta hai aur be-shak Allah sab cheezon ko khoob janta hai
